Languages.Language 1: Draconic, understands but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Horns, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 10 Bludgeoning
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Claws, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 11 Slashing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Chimera makes 3 attacks, one with its bite, one with its horn, and one with its claws.  When Fire Breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its bite or horns
Other Actions.Action 2: Fire Breath, The dragon head exhales fire in a 15ft cone, dealing an average 31 Fire damage to each creature caught in the cone
